author: Special Correspondent
text:
A painting competition marked the National Bird Day celebrations at the Panchayat Union Primary School, K. Ramanathapuram Village in Kadambur Panchayat on Tuesday.

N. T. Selvam, headmaster of the school, underlined the importance of protecting the interest of birds. Explaining the key role played by the birds in protecting the environment, he said that about 12 per cent of world’s 9,800 bird species may face extinction within the next century. He urged the student community to create awareness on protecting birds

He also explained the need for more bird sanctuaries.

Meenambika, member of the School Management Committee, gave away prizes to the winners of the painting competition.
title: National Bird Day celebrated
